title: so about those tentative anivia nerfs....
body:
thats going to gut her 1v1 and dueling potential so hard. 

relegating her to be a farm bot. 

Frostbite (E) 
The double damage effect changed to [if target was recently stunned by Anivia or damaged by fully formed R] from [Slowed by Q or R]
Cooldown lowered to 4 seconds from 5 seconds

there goes the bulk of her damage.

yes her R is getting "buffed" to double ramp up speed but it doesn't matter, no1 is ever in full damage anivia R.

replies.body: And how is this a bad thing? She's suppose to be a farm bot, her biggest strength is suppose to be that she can wipe out an entire minion wave with little thought, not wipe out a squishy with little thought.
And? They both wave clear, but Viktor doesn't have the same level of burst as Anivia, his is far more sustained.

The ult was only buffed in the means of range, as it is now fully formed faster, if you do the math ( not gonna do it again here) You will notice that for the first 1.5 seconds it is less than prior dmg, the it gets more for 1.5 seconds, but in the end, the dmg done will be exactly the same after 3 seconds. I would not consider this a huge buff, and more as a minor tweak. The dmg is literaly lower when you do not use the ult for 3 seconds with enemies inside. Overall I would consider this a nerv with the e changes. (Having one sec less on its cd means nothing if you can't use it right after it is up again. )
Then you could actually land the stun...
which i've always encouraged, but being reasonable... its too difficult a skill shot to rely upon, not that it cant be done, but it just shouldn't gate the rest of her kit.
I can't wait. She's been strong for too long. If she actually ends up needing a buff, they can fix it afterwards.
